00112 void ValidateGameEvents();
00113 
00114 STRATEGICEVENT                                                    *gpEventList = NULL;
00115 
00116 extern UINT32 guiGameClock;
00117 extern BOOLEAN gfTimeInterruptPause;
00118 BOOLEAN gfPreventDeletionOfAnyEvent = FALSE;
00119 BOOLEAN gfEventDeletionPending = FALSE;
00120 
00121 BOOLEAN gfProcessingGameEvents = FALSE;
00122 UINT32      guiTimeStampOfCurrentlyExecutingEvent = 0;
00123 
00124 //Determines if there are any events that will be processed between the current global time,
00125 //and the beginning of the next global time.
00126 BOOLEAN GameEventsPending( UINT32 uiAdjustment )
00127 {
00128       #ifdef CRIPPLED_VERSION
00129       if( guiDay >= 8 )
00130       {
00131             return FALSE;
00132       }
00133       #endif
00134       if( !gpEventList )
00135             return FALSE;
00136       if( gpEventList->uiTimeStamp <= GetWorldTotalSeconds() + uiAdjustment )
00137             return TRUE;
00138       return FALSE;
00139 }
00140 
00141 //returns TRUE if any events were deleted
00142 BOOLEAN DeleteEventsWithDeletionPending()
00143 {
00144       STRATEGICEVENT *curr, *prev, *temp;
00145       BOOLEAN fEventDeleted = FALSE;
00146       //ValidateGameEvents();
00147       curr = gpEventList;
00148       prev = NULL;
00149       while( curr )
00150       {
00151             //ValidateGameEvents();
00152             if( curr->ubFlags & SEF_DELETION_PENDING )
00153             {
00154                   if( prev )
00155                   { //deleting node in middle
00156                         prev->next = curr->next;
00157                         temp = curr;
00158                         curr = curr->next;
00159                         MemFree( temp );
00160                         fEventDeleted = TRUE;
00161                         //ValidateGameEvents();
00162                         continue;
00163                   }
00164                   else
00165                   { //deleting head
00166                         gpEventList = gpEventList->next;
00167                         temp = curr;
00168                         prev = NULL;
00169                         curr = curr->next;
00170                         MemFree( temp );
00171                         fEventDeleted = TRUE;
00172                         //ValidateGameEvents();
00173                         continue;
00174                   }
00175             }
00176             prev = curr;
00177             curr = curr->next;
00178       }
00179       gfEventDeletionPending = FALSE;
00180       return fEventDeleted;
00181 }
00182 
00183 
00184 void AdjustClockToEventStamp( STRATEGICEVENT *pEvent, UINT32 *puiAdjustment )
00185 {
00186       UINT32 uiDiff;
00187 
00188       uiDiff = pEvent->uiTimeStamp - guiGameClock;
00189       guiGameClock += uiDiff;
00190       *puiAdjustment -= uiDiff;
00191 
00192       //Calculate the day, hour, and minutes.
00193       guiDay = ( guiGameClock / NUM_SEC_IN_DAY );
00194       guiHour = ( guiGameClock - ( guiDay * NUM_SEC_IN_DAY ) ) / NUM_SEC_IN_HOUR;
00195       guiMin      = ( guiGameClock - ( ( guiDay * NUM_SEC_IN_DAY ) + ( guiHour * NUM_SEC_IN_HOUR ) ) ) / NUM_SEC_IN_MIN;
00196 
00197       #ifdef CRIPPLED_VERSION
00198       if( guiDay >= 8 )
00199       {
00200             guiDay = 8;
00201             guiHour = 0;
00202             guiMin = 0;
00203             return;
00204       }
00205 
00206       #endif
00207 
00208       swprintf( WORLDTIMESTR, L"%s %d, %02d:%02d", gpGameClockString[ STR_GAMECLOCK_DAY_NAME ], guiDay, guiHour, guiMin );
00209 }
00210 
00211 //If there are any events pending, they are processed, until the time limit is reached, or
00212 //a major event is processed (one that requires the player's attention).
00213 void ProcessPendingGameEvents( UINT32 uiAdjustment, UINT8 ubWarpCode )
00214 {
00215       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"ProcessPendingGameEvents");
00216       STRATEGICEVENT *curr, *pEvent, *prev, *temp;
00217       BOOLEAN fDeleteEvent = FALSE, fDeleteQueuedEvent = FALSE;
00218 
00219       #ifdef CRIPPLED_VERSION
00220       if( guiDay >= 8 )
00221       {
00222             return;
00223       }
00224       #endif
00225 
00226       gfTimeInterrupt = FALSE;
00227       gfProcessingGameEvents = TRUE;
00228 
00229       //While we have events inside the time range to be updated, process them...
00230       curr = gpEventList;
00231       prev = NULL; //prev only used when warping time to target time.
00232       while( !gfTimeInterrupt && curr && curr->uiTimeStamp <= guiGameClock + uiAdjustment )
00233       { 
00234             fDeleteEvent = FALSE;
00235             //Update the time by the difference, but ONLY if the event comes after the current time.
00236             //In the beginning of the game, series of events are created that are placed in the list
00237             //BEFORE the start time.  Those events will be processed without influencing the actual time.
00238             if( curr->uiTimeStamp > guiGameClock && ubWarpCode != WARPTIME_PROCESS_TARGET_TIME_FIRST )
00239             {
00240                   AdjustClockToEventStamp( curr, &uiAdjustment );
00241             }
00242             //Process the event
00243             if( ubWarpCode != WARPTIME_PROCESS_TARGET_TIME_FIRST )
00244             {
00245                   fDeleteEvent = ExecuteStrategicEvent( curr );
00246             }
00247             else if( curr->uiTimeStamp == guiGameClock + uiAdjustment )
00248             { //if we are warping to the target time to process that event first,
00249                   if( !curr->next || curr->next->uiTimeStamp > guiGameClock + uiAdjustment )
00250                   { //make sure that we are processing the last event for that second
00251                         AdjustClockToEventStamp( curr, &uiAdjustment );
00252 
00253                         fDeleteEvent = ExecuteStrategicEvent( curr );
00254                         
00255                         if( curr && prev && fDeleteQueuedEvent )
00256                         { //The only case where we are deleting a node in the middle of the list
00257                               prev->next = curr->next;
00258                         }
00259                   }
00260                   else
00261                   { //We are at the current target warp time however, there are still other events following in this time cycle.
00262                         //We will only target the final event in this time.  NOTE:  Events are posted using a FIFO method
00263                         prev = curr;
00264                         curr = curr->next;
00265                         continue;
00266                   }
00267             }
00268             else
00269             { //We are warping time to the target time.  We haven't found the event yet,
00270                   //so continuing will keep processing the list until we find it.  NOTE:  Events are posted using a FIFO method
00271                   prev = curr;
00272                   curr = curr->next;
00273                   continue;
00274             }
00275             if( fDeleteEvent )
00276             {
00277                   //Determine if event node is a special event requiring reposting
00278                   switch( curr->ubEventType )
00279                   {
00280                         case RANGED_EVENT:
00281                               AddAdvancedStrategicEvent( ENDRANGED_EVENT, curr->ubCallbackID, curr->uiTimeStamp+curr->uiTimeOffset, curr->uiParam );
00282                               break;
00283                         case PERIODIC_EVENT:
00284                               pEvent = AddAdvancedStrategicEvent( PERIODIC_EVENT, curr->ubCallbackID, curr->uiTimeStamp+curr->uiTimeOffset, curr->uiParam );
00285                               if( pEvent )
00286                                     pEvent->uiTimeOffset = curr->uiTimeOffset;
00287                               break;
00288                         case EVERYDAY_EVENT:
00289                               AddAdvancedStrategicEvent( EVERYDAY_EVENT, curr->ubCallbackID, curr->uiTimeStamp+NUM_SEC_IN_DAY, curr->uiParam );
00290                               break;
00291                   }
00292                   if( curr == gpEventList )
00293                   {
00294                         gpEventList = gpEventList->next;
00295                         MemFree( curr );
00296                         curr = gpEventList;
00297                         prev = NULL;
00298                         //ValidateGameEvents();
00299                   }
00300                   else 
00301                   {
00302                         temp = curr;
00303                         prev->next = curr->next;
00304                         curr = curr->next;
00305                         MemFree( temp );
00306                         //ValidateGameEvents();
00307                   }
00308             }
00309             else
00310             {
00311                   prev = curr;
00312                   curr = curr->next;
00313             }
00314       }
00315       
00316       gfProcessingGameEvents = FALSE;
00317 
00318       if( gfEventDeletionPending )
00319       {
00320             DeleteEventsWithDeletionPending();
00321       }
00322 
00323       if( uiAdjustment && !gfTimeInterrupt )
00324             guiGameClock += uiAdjustment;
00325 
00326       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"ProcessPendingGameEvents done");
00327 }

00352 }
00353 
00354 STRATEGICEVENT* AddAdvancedStrategicEvent( UINT8 ubEventType, UINT8 ubCallbackID, UINT32 uiTimeStamp, UINT32 uiParam )
00355 {
00356       STRATEGICEVENT          *pNode, *pNewNode, *pPrevNode;
00357 
00358       if( gfProcessingGameEvents && uiTimeStamp <= guiTimeStampOfCurrentlyExecutingEvent )
00359       { //Prevents infinite loops of posting events that are the same time or earlier than the event
00360             //currently being processed.
00361             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00362                   //if( ubCallbackID == EVENT_PROCESS_TACTICAL_SCHEDULE )
00363                   {
00364                         ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_DEBUG, L"%s Event Rejected:  Can't post events <= time while inside an event callback.  This is a special case situation that isn't a bug.", gEventName[ ubCallbackID ] );
00365                   }
00366                   //else
00367                   //{
00368                   //    AssertMsg( 0, String( "%S Event Rejected:  Can't post events <= time while inside an event callback.", gEventName[ ubCallbackID ] ) );
00369                   //}
00370             #endif
00371             return NULL;
00372       }
00373 
00374       pNewNode = (STRATEGICEVENT *) MemAlloc( sizeof( STRATEGICEVENT ) );
00375       Assert( pNewNode );
00376       memset( pNewNode, 0, sizeof( STRATEGICEVENT ) );
00377       pNewNode->ubCallbackID        = ubCallbackID;
00378       pNewNode->uiParam                         = uiParam;
00379       pNewNode->ubEventType               = ubEventType;
00380       pNewNode->uiTimeStamp               = uiTimeStamp;
00381       pNewNode->uiTimeOffset              = 0;
00382 
00383       // Search list for a place to insert
00384       pNode = gpEventList;
00385 
00386       // If it's the first head, do this!
00387       if( !pNode )
00388       {
00389             gpEventList = pNewNode;
00390             pNewNode->next = NULL;
00391       }
00392       else
00393       {
00394             pPrevNode = NULL;
00395             while( pNode )
00396             {
00397                   if( uiTimeStamp < pNode->uiTimeStamp )
00398                   {
00399                         break;
00400                   }
00401                   pPrevNode = pNode;
00402                   pNode = pNode->next;
00403             }
00404 
00405             // If we are at the end, set at the end!
00406             if ( !pNode )
00407             {
00408                   pPrevNode->next = pNewNode;
00409                   pNewNode->next  = NULL;
00410             }
00411             else
00412             {
00413                   // We have a previous node here
00414                   // Insert IN FRONT!
00415                   if ( pPrevNode )
00416                   {
00417                         pNewNode->next = pPrevNode->next;
00418                         pPrevNode->next = pNewNode;
00419                   }
00420                   else
00421                   {     // It's the head
00422                         pNewNode->next = gpEventList;
00423                         gpEventList = pNewNode;
00424                   }
00425             }
00426       }
00427 
00428       return pNewNode ;
00429 }

00431 BOOLEAN AddStrategicEvent( UINT8 ubCallbackID, UINT32 uiMinStamp, UINT32 uiParam )
00432 {
00433       if( AddAdvancedStrategicEvent( ONETIME_EVENT, ubCallbackID, uiMinStamp*60, uiParam ) )
00434             return TRUE;
00435       return FALSE;
00436 }

00447 {

00450       if( pEvent )
00451       {
00452             pEvent->uiTimeOffset = uiLengthMin * 60;
00453             return TRUE;
00454       }
00455       return FALSE;
00456 }

00504 //NEW:  Period Events
00505 //Event will get processed automatically once every X minutes.
00506 BOOLEAN AddPeriodStrategicEvent( UINT8 ubCallbackID, UINT32 uiOnceEveryXMinutes, UINT32 uiParam )
00507 {
00508       STRATEGICEVENT *pEvent;
00509       pEvent = AddAdvancedStrategicEvent( PERIODIC_EVENT, ubCallbackID, GetWorldDayInSeconds() + uiOnceEveryXMinutes * 60, uiParam );
00510       if( pEvent )
00511       {
00512             pEvent->uiTimeOffset = uiOnceEveryXMinutes * 60;
00513             return TRUE;
00514       }
00515       return FALSE;
00516 }

00553 
00554 void DeleteAllStrategicEventsOfType( UINT8 ubCallbackID )
00555 {
00556       STRATEGICEVENT    *curr, *prev, *temp;
00557       prev = NULL;
00558       curr = gpEventList;
00559       while( curr )
00560       {
00561             if( curr->ubCallbackID == ubCallbackID && !(curr->ubFlags & SEF_DELETION_PENDING) )
00562             {
00563                   if( gfPreventDeletionOfAnyEvent )
00564                   {
00565                         curr->ubFlags |= SEF_DELETION_PENDING;
00566                         gfEventDeletionPending = TRUE;
00567                         prev = curr;
00568                         curr = curr->next;
00569                         continue;
00570                   }
00571                   //Detach the node
00572                   if( prev )
00573                         prev->next = curr->next;
00574                   else
00575                         gpEventList = curr->next;
00576                   
00577                   //isolate and remove curr
00578                   temp = curr;
00579                   curr = curr->next;
00580                   MemFree( temp );
00581                   //ValidateGameEvents();
00582             }
00583             else
00584             {     //Advance all the nodes
00585                   prev = curr;
00586                   curr = curr->next;
00587             }
00588       }
00589 }
00590 
00591 void DeleteAllStrategicEvents()
00592 {
00593       STRATEGICEVENT *temp;
00594       while( gpEventList )
00595       {
00596             temp = gpEventList;
00597             gpEventList = gpEventList->next;
00598             MemFree( temp );
00599             //ValidateGameEvents();
00600             temp = NULL;
00601       }
00602       gpEventList = NULL;
00603 }
00604 
00605 //Searches for and removes the first event matching the supplied information.  There may very well be a need
00606 //for more specific event removal, so let me know (Kris), of any support needs.  Function returns FALSE if
00607 //no events were found or if the event wasn't deleted due to delete lock,
00608 BOOLEAN DeleteStrategicEvent( UINT8 ubCallbackID, UINT32 uiParam )
00609 {
00610       STRATEGICEVENT *curr, *prev;
00611       curr = gpEventList;
00612       prev = NULL;
00613       while( curr )
00614       { //deleting middle
00615             if( curr->ubCallbackID == ubCallbackID && curr->uiParam == uiParam )
00616             {
00617                   if( !(curr->ubFlags & SEF_DELETION_PENDING) )
00618                   {
00619                         if( gfPreventDeletionOfAnyEvent )
00620                         {
00621                               curr->ubFlags |= SEF_DELETION_PENDING;
00622                               gfEventDeletionPending = TRUE;
00623                               return FALSE;
00624                         }
00625                         if( prev )
00626                         {
00627                               prev->next = curr->next;
00628                         }
00629                         else
00630                         {
00631                               gpEventList = gpEventList->next;
00632                         }
00633                         MemFree( curr );
00634                         //ValidateGameEvents();
00635                         return TRUE;
00636                   }
00637             }
00638             prev = curr;
00639             curr = curr->next;
00640       }
00641       return FALSE;
00642 }
00643 
00644 
00645 
00646 //part of the game.sav files (not map files)
00647 BOOLEAN SaveStrategicEventsToSavedGame( HWFILE hFile )
00648 {
00649       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
00650       STRATEGICEVENT sGameEvent;
00651 
00652       UINT32      uiNumGameEvents=0;
00653       STRATEGICEVENT *pTempEvent = gpEventList;
00654       
00655       //Go through the list and determine the number of events
00656       while( pTempEvent )
00657       {
00658             pTempEvent = pTempEvent->next;
00659             uiNumGameEvents++;
00660       }
00661 
00662 
00663       //write the number of strategic events
00664       FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumGameEvents, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00665       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00666       {
00667             return(FALSE);
00668       }
00669 
00670 
00671       //loop through all the events and save them.
00672       pTempEvent = gpEventList;
00673       while( pTempEvent )
00674       {
00675             //save the current structure
00676             memcpy( &sGameEvent, pTempEvent, sizeof( STRATEGICEVENT ) );
00677 
00678             //write the current strategic event
00679             FileWrite( hFile, &sGameEvent, sizeof( STRATEGICEVENT ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00680             if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( STRATEGICEVENT ) )
00681             {
00682                   return(FALSE);
00683             }
00684 
00685             pTempEvent = pTempEvent->next;
00686       }
00687 
00688  
00689       return( TRUE );
00690 }
00691 
00692 
00693 BOOLEAN LoadStrategicEventsFromSavedGame( HWFILE hFile )
00694 {
00695       UINT32            uiNumGameEvents;
00696       STRATEGICEVENT sGameEvent;
00697       UINT32            cnt;
00698       UINT32            uiNumBytesRead=0;
00699       STRATEGICEVENT *pTemp = NULL;
00700 
00701 
00702       //erase the old Game Event queue
00703       DeleteAllStrategicEvents();
00704 
00705       
00706       //Read the number of strategic events
00707       FileRead( hFile, &uiNumGameEvents, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00708       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00709       {
00710             return(FALSE);
00711       }
00712 
00713 
00714       pTemp = NULL;
00715 
00716       //loop through all the events and save them.
00717       for( cnt=0; cnt<uiNumGameEvents; cnt++ )
00718       {
00719             STRATEGICEVENT *pTempEvent = NULL;
00720 
00721             // allocate memory for the event
00722             pTempEvent = (STRATEGICEVENT *) MemAlloc( sizeof( STRATEGICEVENT ) );
00723             if( pTempEvent == NULL )
00724                   return( FALSE );
00725 
00726             //Read the current strategic event
00727             FileRead( hFile, &sGameEvent, sizeof( STRATEGICEVENT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00728             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( STRATEGICEVENT ) )
00729             {
00730                   return(FALSE);
00731             }
00732 
00733 
00734             memcpy( pTempEvent, &sGameEvent, sizeof( STRATEGICEVENT ) );
00735 
00736             // Add the new node to the list
00737 
00738             //if its the first node, 
00739             if( cnt == 0 )
00740             {
00741                   // assign it as the head node
00742                   gpEventList = pTempEvent;
00743 
00744                   //assign the 'current node' to the head node
00745                   pTemp = gpEventList;
00746             }
00747             else
00748             {
00749                   // add the new node to the next field of the current node
00750                   pTemp->next = pTempEvent;
00751 
00752                   //advance the current node to the next node
00753                   pTemp = pTemp->next;
00754             }
00755 
00756             // NULL out the next field ( cause there is no next field yet )
00757             pTempEvent->next = NULL;
00758       }
00759 
00760       return( TRUE );
00761 }
00762 
00763 void LockStrategicEventFromDeletion( STRATEGICEVENT *pEvent )
00764 {
00765       pEvent->ubFlags |= SEF_PREVENT_DELETION;
00766 }
00767 
00768 void UnlockStrategicEventFromDeletion( STRATEGICEVENT *pEvent )
00769 {
00770       pEvent->ubFlags &= ~SEF_PREVENT_DELETION;
00771 }
00772 
00773 void ValidateGameEvents()
00774 {
00775       STRATEGICEVENT *curr;
00776       curr = gpEventList;
00777       while( curr )
00778       {
00779             curr = curr->next;
00780             if( curr == (STRATEGICEVENT*)0xdddddddd )
00781             {
00782                   return;
00783             }
00784       }
00785 }
